samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript drop-down list control shows the default rendering of the drop-down list control with minimum configuration.

samples.name: Grouping and Icons
samples.description: This demo explains the grouping based on different categories with individual header and icon support in the Syncfusion JavaScript drop-down list control.

samples.name: Data Binding
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript drop-down list control shows how to bind with  local data source and how to fetch data from remote data service.

samples.name: Template
samples.description: This demo shows how to customize the appearance of each item in the pop-up list using template option in Syncfusion JavaScript drop-down list control.

samples.name: Filtering
samples.description: This demo explains the filtering functionalities of the Syncfusion JavaScript drop-down list control.

samples.name: Cascading
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript drop-down list control shows the cascading support.

samples.name: Inline
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript drop-down list control demonstrates to render the drop-down list control in line with other content.

samples.name: Diacritics Filtering
samples.description: This demo explains the diacritics filter functionality of the Syncfusion JavaScript drop-down list control.
